captions.text: It’s crazy thinking that BMX will take you to a place like this, you know, which is in the middle of nowhere.
I’ve never seen transitions that are made naturally by volcano lava…
And here we will choose the best rider who will ride in all the places we decide.
And then we will have the best trick.
As far as the eye can see it’s all transitions, jumps and waterpipes. It’s perfect, incredible, I’ve never experienced anything like it.
I was trying the 360 tail whip to barspin. And I got really frustrated…
then I calmed down, and I gave it two more tries, and I made it…

title: BMX Competition on the Moon? - Red Bull Ramparanoia 2012

comments.text:
Subscribe to my channel for Alaskan BMX and Snowmobile videos! i love 
extreme sports, They're my life. I love adrenaline which is why i ride. But 
i also want to show people im a dedicated rider. I have been riding for 6 
years. With a 3 month summer and 6 month winter and the rest is rainy/cold 
weather its hard to ride. But we still get it done. Sub for amazing sport 
videos and any videos you would like to see! Thanks guys! P.S. ill sub back.
